授業方法:
In principle, this class will be face-to-face; however, all class materials, tasks, and explanations will be posted in a Google Classroom dedicated to this class.

The course format may include the following:
- Individual, pair, and group discussion based on topics that relate to content
- Sharing of information, including weekly homework assignments, on Google Classroom- Presentation and homework assignments
- As a level 3 course, all English tasks expected to be completed at an advanced level

第1回:
**The schedule below is an example of what the course may look like, but it will depend on whether a suitable overseas partner university is identified for virtual exchange or COIL. Specific contents will not be decided upon until after a needs analysis is done (during first class) to determine the interests, backgrounds, and needs of enrolled students**

Week 1: Class overview, introductions, ice breakers

In principle, all 14 sessions will be conducted face to face, with the exception of live sessions with overseas partner university students
Needs Analysis Survey: 1 hour
第2回: Week 2: What is culture and intercultural communication? Discuss first 280-word journal

For six classes, students will need to submit a 280-word journal based on discussion questions related to the topic.
Journal 1: 1-2 hours
第3回: Week 3: A critical cross-cultural comparison of etiquette; discuss second 280-word journal
第4回: Week 4: COIL #1 - live ice breakers with overseas students via Zoom
第5回: Week 5: Nonverbal communication in intercultural encounters; discuss third 280-word journal
第6回: Week 6: COIL #2 – asynchronous video on Japanese culture and expressions
第7回: Week 7: Time to DIE – describe, interpret, evaluate selected visual media; discuss fourth 280-word journal
第8回: Week 8: COIL #3 – synchronous video on Japanese & overseas media and stereotypes
第9回: Week 9: viral media across cultures; discuss fifth 280-word journal
第10回: Week 10: COIL #4 – asynchronous response to overseas student videos about their hometowns
第11回: Week 11: COIL #5 – live discussion with overseas students to discuss prior activities; discuss sixth 280-word journal

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading2: COIL Activities and weekly journal writing
